tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE medication_safety (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT NOT NULL,
    drug_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    interaction_id INT,
    side_effect_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (interaction_id) REFERENCES drug_interactions(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (side_effect_id) REFERENCES side_effects(id)
);

CREATE TABLE drug_interactions (
 id INT NOT NULL,
 drug1_id INT NOT NULL,
 drug2_id INT NOT NULL,
 interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
 interaction_description TEXT,
 PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE drug_side_effects (
 id INT NOT NULL,
 drug_id INT NOT NULL,
 side_effect VARCHAR(100),
 effect_description TEXT,
 PRIMARY KEY (id),
 FOREIGN KEY (drug_id) REFERENCES drugs(id)
);

CREATE TABLE drugs (
 id INT NOT NULL,
 drug_name VARCHAR(100),
 manufacturer VARCHAR(100),
 dosage VARCHAR(20),
 PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE patient_medication (
 id INT NOT NULL,
 patient_id INT NOT NULL,
 drug_id INT NOT NULL,
 dosage VARCHAR(20),
 start_date DATE,
 end_date DATE,
 PRIMARY KEY (id),
 FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(id),
 FOREIGN KEY (drug_id) REFERENCES drugs(id)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    medical_history TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE prescriptions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    medication_id INT,
    prescribed_date DATE,
    dosage_instructions TEXT
);
